simbio.se.sau.json

Class JsonUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • simbio.se.sau.json.JsonUtils

  • public class JsonUtils
extends Object
    This class provide with a static way methods to convert Object to Json String and vice versa. This class use Gson to do it, so for more details see Gson
    Author:
    Ademar Alves de Oliveira ademar111190@gmail.com

      The static instance of Gson

      JsonUtils()

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Object fromJson(String json, Class<?> theClass, Object def)
      This method convert a Json String to a Object and if get some error return the default object param, for more details see Gson.fromJson(String, Class)
      static Object fromJsonOrNull(String json, Class<?> theClass)
      This method convert a Json String to a Object and if get some error return null, for more details see Gson.fromJson(String, Class)
      static String toJson(Object object)
      This method convert a Object to a Json String, for more details see Gson.toJson(Object)

    • Method Detail

      • toJson

        public static String toJson(Object object)
        This method convert a Object to a Json String, for more details see Gson.toJson(Object)
        Parameters:
        object - to be converted to Json String
        Returns:
        a String with Json format

      • fromJson

        public static Object fromJson(String json,
              Class<?> theClass,
              Object def)
        This method convert a Json String to a Object and if get some error return the default object param, for more details see Gson.fromJson(String, Class)
        Parameters:
        json - a Json String mapping the object
        theClass - The Class of object mapped
        def - default object if it get some error
        Returns:
        a Object represented from json parameter and with class struct from theClass.

      • fromJsonOrNull

        public static Object fromJsonOrNull(String json,
                    Class<?> theClass)
        This method convert a Json String to a Object and if get some error return null, for more details see Gson.fromJson(String, Class)
        Parameters:
        json - a Json String mapping the object
        theClass - The Class of object mapped
        Returns:
        a Object represented from json parameter and with class struct from theClass or null if get some error.
